attributes.additional_details:
Voting in the forthcoming European Referendum  (2015) to decide if we should leave or stay in the european Union should be restricted to people who fulfill the following criteria.
A/ Are resident in the United Kingdom
B/ Are registered British citizens.

rejection.details:
Please see below petition:

Petition title: EU Referendum In 2015

Created by: Peter Fenny

Closing: 04/02/2015
